name: E*TRADE FINANCIAL CORPORATION
description: Financial services company that provides investment, trading, and banking services.
sampleDescriptions: Advocate for the passage of H.R. 1043 / S. 460, the Employer Participation in Repayment Act of 2019.
Advocate for passage of H.R. 1043 / S. 460, the Employer Participation in Repayment Act of 2019; monitor H.R. 748, the CARES Act, and other coronavirus legislation.
Monitor implementation of P.L. 116-136, the CARES Act, with a focus on the Employer Participation in Repayment provisions and support efforts to make the provision permanent.
